title: Position report message from an AIS device
description: A position report message for the AIS.

position.description: The position of the AIS entity

position_accuracy.description: The accuracy of the given AIS position

speed_over_ground.description: The Speed Over Ground of the ship in 1/10 knot steps (0-102.2 knots). 1 023 = not available, 1 022 = 102.2 knots or higher

rate_of_turn.description: The Rate Of Turn of the ship in degrees, minus = turning left; plus = turning right; (-128  no turn information available (default))

course_over_ground.description: The course over ground (COG) of the vessel 0-3599. 3600 = not available = default.

raim_flag.description: Receiver autonomous integrity monitoring (RAIM) flag of electronic position fixing device

special_maneuvre_indicator.description: Indicates whether an special maneuver is ongoing
